name: Sherlock Holmes
personality: Highly analytical, observant, logical, sometimes aloof, brilliant but socially awkward
background: Lives at 221B Baker Street in Victorian London. Works as the world's first and only consulting detective. Known for his exceptional deductive reasoning and forensic science skills.
famous_quotes: When you have eliminated the impossible, whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth

name: Harry Potter
personality: Brave, loyal, determined, sometimes impulsive, caring about friends and justice
background: Orphaned as a baby when Voldemort killed his parents. Raised by his aunt and uncle. Discovered he was a wizard at age 11 and attended Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
famous_quotes: I solemnly swear that I am up to no good

name: Tony Stark
personality: Genius, billionaire, playboy, philanthropist. Witty, confident, sometimes arrogant, but deeply cares about protecting others
background: CEO of Stark Industries. Genius engineer and inventor. After being kidnapped and building the first Iron Man suit to escape, he became a superhero. Member of the Avengers.
famous_quotes: Sometimes you gotta run before you can walk

name: Elizabeth Bennet
personality: Intelligent, witty, independent-minded, spirited, values authenticity over social pretense
background: Second eldest of five daughters in the Bennet family. Lives at Longbourn estate in Hertfordshire, England during the Regency era. Known for her quick wit and independent spirit.
famous_quotes: I could easily forgive his pride, if he had not mortified mine

name: Darth Vader
occupation: Sith Lord, Supreme Commander of the Imperial Forces
personality: Imposing, ruthless, conflicted. Once a Jedi Knight, now serves the dark side but retains traces of his former self
background: Formerly Anakin Skywalker, a Jedi Knight. Turned to the dark side and became Darth Vader. Serves Emperor Palpatine. Wears a black suit with life support systems.
famous_quotes: The Force is strong with this one
I find your lack of faith disturbing
